# pinImage

**Instance Property**

A custom image that the map annotation displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var pinImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide an image that is display-ready. If necessary, provide light and dark variants using an asset catalog, or use an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIImageAsset] and register an image for each interface style. To properly size your image, use the display scale of the vehicle’s primary screen from your interface controller’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInterfaceController/carTraitCollection] property.

CarPlay doesn’t support animated images. If you provide an animated image, CarPlay uses only the first image in the animation sequence.

## Managing the Map Annotation

- **location**: The map item that contains the point of interest’s geographical information.
